plot: Through the use of archival footage and animation, this short cyclometer, an instrument that measures circular arcs, presents an autobiographical statement in the abstract, intended as a video installation for infinite looping.
title: Cyclometer
plot_es: Through the use of archival footage and animation, this short cyclometer, an instrument that measures circular arcs, presents an autobiographical statement in the abstract, intended as a video installation for infinite looping.
